title: a298b112
author: a298b112
content: So, as the question says who do you think a beginner could follow on twitter/read the blog /watch on youtube in order to learn/understand the cryptomarket? Basically looking for some source of info that makes sense to consume, as there are tons of garbage on the Internet.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: 1. Read books2. Look around Twitter for reputable traders/investors that doesn't promote paid groups and doesn't just deliberately shill their bags3. Read a good chunk of articles about market psychologyP.S. if you're only going to buy BTC, probably just learn about Bitcoin in general and just do dollar-cost averaging.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Before someone gave a guide to those newbies, they're already follow and read anything on social media lol.It's not recommendable for a beginner who doesn't know anything to learn Bitcoin through social media. Books e.g. Mastering Bitcoin is the best to start, however most teenager doesn't like to read books and only want to read short articles or watch on youtube. To be honest they also can learn through this forum or reddit. The thing is they're mostly looking about trading and how to earn money, not want to learn from the basic.

Reading or binge watching stuffs would allow you separate the garbage from content that are useful to newbies.What do you wish to understand about the crypto market? comments.body: Reading is my best choice when come to education. Here is my recommendation:Binance Academy: this is the best place for beginners. comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Op, since you mentioned the crypto market, I guess you want to learn more about trading. Before you start following some reputable traders or investors on social media, I suggest you master the basics first. Try to get a basic understanding of how the market works, and how to use different trading strategies. Many of these traders also talk about fundamental and technical analysis, so I suggest you read up on those as well. This will help you to understand about their trading strategies, and you can then follow them without any fear of being lost in the technical jargon.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: a298b112 on May 14, 2022, 06:37:59 AMSo, as the question says who do you think a beginner could follow on twitter/read the blog /watch on youtube in order to learn/understand the cryptomarket? Basically looking for some source of info that makes sense to consume, as there are tons of garbage on the Internet. There are several crypto influencers that you can easily watch on YouTube. I don't want to put out any name here because I don't know how your passion is and to what extend you would want to take their word and call of action. To be frank, crypto is a highly speculative business and as such no one should take anyone seriously serious when predictions are made. Nonetheless, you should watch and take points from them but don't follow whatever they say hook, line and sinker.
